Body: Is the proof of concept nursing home at full capacity right now? If it works at full capacity how mÄ±ch you get? And your income from those 2 apartments?

Author: HomeToken
Title: [ANN][ICO LIVE] HomeToken - Tokenized Real Estate Fund in Emerging Asia
Body: Thanks for your queries Ben!  The nursing home has received it's first couple of residents! It will definitely take time to market it make people aware as it's brand new!  Nonetheless the team has held several open houses and there's an upcoming mid-autumn event this coming Wednesday.  As it is our first, we are gathering feedback from these events.  We also have medical tourists moving in to take advantage of the nursing services available while they're out of hospital. There has been queries about daycare as well.  To cover monthly costs, we only need 20% occupancy and we will surpass that by next month. Current tenants are 100% female at the moment.  There are also certain profiles that we don't accept as it would take too much resources.  The website has been updated recently here: http://www.themansion.com.my/  Yes both the apartments stated on our website is tenanted at close to 10% rental rate/annum. Our studio to an expatriate and our multi room apartment to an IT company.

Author: nmrcngrb
Title: [ANN][ICO LIVE] HomeToken - Tokenized Real Estate Fund in Emerging Asia
Body: In every ICO I always ask myself at least 2 questions: -What will cause a market demand for the coin so the price can go up? -What will convince people not to sell it once ICO ends so the price will not drop?  Can someone give me short answer on this two?

Author: HomeToken
Title: [ANN][ICO LIVE] HomeToken - Tokenized Real Estate Fund in Emerging Asia
Body: Hey there!  We ask the same questions ourselves!  1. From our point of view, we need to show that we have a good business model and the ability to execute it. There are many ways to increase demand and token prices after ICO. The most basic way is to keep your promises to investors and prove that you've met your objectives stated in your roadmap. Keep regular meaningful updates and stay in the public eye. Here at HomeToken, we chose the shortest route to profitability to build our brand and trust. We've seen too many startups failed because they're out of touch and build platforms that no one asked for. There is an unhealthy trend where startups continue burn through investor's funds for years without a year of profit before failing eventually. Just look at Uber struggling at the moment.  2. From what we've seen, token prices fall after ICO because of tokens given during bounty campaigns and high token bonuses during ICO. Too often, developers start getting lazy and go quiet, after raising funds from ICO. Token prices of good projects will recover eventually. We will also have a token buyback program to support the value of our tokens.

Author: HomeToken
Title: [ANN][ICO LIVE] HomeToken - Tokenized Real Estate Fund in Emerging Asia
Body: Hi there, we believe that the WAVES client is more user friendly for people new to cryptocurrencies.  Quote from: l10no on August 02, 2017, 03:47:08 AM Other projects with the concept of real estate, very promising, although many projects with the same concept, I hope this project has a good plan to survive and compete, I see this project has a good team, I will continue to wait for updates from this project, good luck  Thank you! Real estate is a trillion dollar market and we will provide more updates soon.  Quote from: Gwyn on August 02, 2017, 03:57:50 AM  Looking promising project. Will keep my eyes on this project. Any bounty available for Bitcointalker member ? I would like to join the bounty if available,make bounty or airdrop to help you promotion this project,i will be supportfull   We will have a bounty campaign and will announce the details once ready.  Quote from: btcbabhh on August 02, 2017, 04:03:10 AM if the token's price 1$ per one  that will need 100000000$ ?  is it a min goal for project ? or if not rasie 100000000$  ?  edit sorry ,  i just see that 65000000 tokens for sell.  Only 65 million for token sale. The remainder will be used for various purposes. More details when we move closer to ICO.  Quote from: Fargo on August 02, 2017, 04:19:54 AM Hi - Enjoyed reading about your company.  Quick question - In your whitepaper, page 8, it says that Quote "Revenue earned by HomeToken will also be reinvested and positioned to expand the overall property portfolio, both in terms of quality and quantity.  We strongly believe that the value of the HomeToken will increase based on the correlative increase of the rental income and investment properties owned."   So earnings of the properties are not distributed back to the Token holders via a dividend?  Under your HomeToken buyback program - are these tokens burned?  Hi Fargo,  Thanks for your comment!  Earnings will be used to expand the property portfolio and buyback our tokens from open markets, to reduce token supply.  We feel that buybacks are more straightforward than dividends because tokens may be kept at centralized exchanges in the future.  No smart contracts on WAVES yet, to burn tokens but we will disclose the details of the tokens that were bought back and the address they're kept in.  We will monitor the developments of the old and new economy and adopt the best practices because we want to be transparent and repay our investors.

Author: HomeToken
Title: [ANN][ICO LIVE] HomeToken - Tokenized Real Estate Fund in Emerging Asia
Body: Thank you for your support!  Quote from: feelideb on August 30, 2017, 07:41:37 AM  Waves is the next smart contract platform. I bet u 'all be sorry if you don't buy into this project.  We believe in WAVES too! HODL!  Quote from: adam1230 on August 30, 2017, 08:03:27 AM i am very happ that this wonderfull ico is based on WAVES Waves is more powerfull then ETH. and this great ico will effect WAVES price rise. Good Luck and hope this will be a smooth ico  Thank you for your support & encouragement!  Quote from: namorthesu on August 30, 2017, 12:49:15 PM In general, the idea is clear to me, but I don't quite understand, how will investment risks be monitored?  Thanks for your comment!  Before we even purchase an investment property, we will conduct the necessary inspection, research and comparison to ensure that our purchase is easy to rent, with healthy capital appreciation. We have already done this for many years.  We are targeting small and micro apartments near public transport within the city, which are in high demand in big cities around the world.  As per our whitepaper, we only plan on purchasing completed units to avoid getting exposed to incomplete and abandoned properties.  We also have contacts that will help us renovate and lease out our units at competitive prices.  Naturally, HomeToken will have to monitor the properties owned and local market sentiments closely.  Last but not least, population and economic growth in the housing markets we are in, will only increase demand for the type of properties we want.  Our token buyback program was created to protect the value of our token and investors.  With proper financial management, we will be able to reduce most of the risks normally associated with property investments, and withstand potential economic downturns.
